radiographic_examinations.findings: Air-filled loops of small bowel and colon with air projecting over the rectum. No free intra-abdominal air is present. Lumbar spine degenerative changes are present.
Non-specific gallbladder wall thickening, mild to moderate fluid and stranding around the pancreas, no pulmonary embolism (PE).
Gallbladder filled with stones, limited assessment of gallbladder wall due to stones, equivocal sonography signs due to diffuse abdominal tenderness, and a CBD that was dilated to 8 mm.
